withKey:
As you enter the room, the Mystic Key glows brightly and reacts to the room's energy.
✦ In a flash of light, you are teleported out to safety ✦.
Well done, and see you on your next adventure!

The room hums with power as the Mystic Key awakens.
Light bends, reality shimmers, and suddenly you are free.
✦ Your journey ends, but another awaits ✦

The Mystic Key vibrates violently in your hand. The room answers its call.
A blinding light surrounds you, and the world fades away.
✦ You have escaped ✦

Symbols on the walls ignite as the Mystic Key responds.
Space twists for a moment, then everything goes silent.
✦ You are safe at last ✦

The room accepts the Mystic Key. A surge of magic lifts you off the ground.
In the blink of an eye, you are gone.

✦ Only the Mystic Key may open the way ✦

The room watches you. Judging. Waiting.
